item.title: Add Outlook Shared Mailbox Rules for Disabling Notifications
item.description: When you are using a functional mailbox which gets too many emails in Outlook (older Outlook Application in Windows), it can be distracting. In this article, we are going to see how to disable notifications for shared mailbox. Table of contents  Disable All Notifications Add Rules to Mailbox In Conclusion Disable All Notifications In first step, we need to disable all the notifications for the Outlook.
